questionTitle: If she  _______ him,she would be very happy.
If he  _______ a thorough knowledge of English, he could have applied for this post.
If I had enough money,I _______ abroad to improve my English.
The bench would collapse if they _______ on it.
If it _______ convenient, let's go out for a drink tonight,
If you _______ time, please write to me.
I shouldn't go there at night if I  _____ you.
If I  _______ get a pole, I will go fishing.
If you had the chance, _______ you go fishing?
If you  _______ a choice, which country would you visit?
